scripts.docs: typedoc --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --out ./docs src/index.ts --mode file --theme minimal --internal-aliases internal,publicapi,api --external-aliases external,internalapi
scripts.build:js: npm run eventmap ; tsc ; npm run build:bundle
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:dts
scripts.watch: npm run eventmap ; concurrently -c green,blue,red -n dtsbundle,esbuild,tsc 'chokidar --silent "./src/**/*.ts" -c "npm run build:dts"' 'chokidar --silent "./src/**/*.ts" -c "npm run build:bundle"' 'tsc -w --noEmit | wtsc'
